Text:
Please how set i this item on my xbox 360? I dont wan to make my HDD open. Please help!
How do i set this on FTP and upload it to my xbox? My xbox 360 have the new dashboard so i cant JTAG.
you need a jtagged xbox check ebay!

Thx only i have special buy a xbox for xbox live.
For download demo's ect... So i dont want a JTAG. So are there other Solutions?
No, you can only download DLC and XBLA titles and use them on JTAG'ed consoles. Period - no workarounds.

To Illanair

You can for some dlc, but others (like this) have author ownership rights
